fields.default:
Go to your DNS provider and create a CNAME record with target same as your current site name.
for example is your current site name is example.onehash.is and you want to add www.newdomain.com then follow these steps
1. Open DNS settings
2. Create CNAME record with subdomain as "www" and target as example.onehash.is
3. Return to document and click on verify
4. Once verified your newly added domain will be live
fields.label: How to set Custom domain
fields.options:
Steps to add custom subdomain
  1. Open your DNS provider settings
  2. create a CNAME record with target to your current site name
For example if you want to add www.human.com to your site example.onehash.is
  1. Open your DNS provider ( eg GoDaddy)
  2. Select CNAME as record type
  3. Put "www" (your root subdomain) in the field "Name" and example.onehash.is in the "Value" field
  4. Click Save button
  5. Click on the verify button. The verification might fail for few minutes due to delay in DNS propogation by your DNS provider

For more information contact OneHash Support!
